item.title: Home - Pocket RSS
item.description: This app generates an automatically updating RSS feed from your Pocket saves. To get started, press 'Login with Pocket' above. It did, until 2024. For some reason they stopped supporting RSS feeds for anyone. So, I made this app to fix that.
